categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance conducted a raid in the Corsin system, a star system located within the Plooriods.
Following the disaster at Deepspace Besh, the Rebel Alliance stepped up raids and military action in an effort to keep the Imperial Navy off balance.
As part of this strategy, the Rebel Alliance launched several raids in the Plooriods, including one in the Corsin system.
The raid in the Corsin system resulted in a victory for the Rebel Alliance.
